ValidationRule.description: Validation for services products. Built according to US# 46314 Deployed again for bug 47136
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, 'Services'), OR( ISCHANGED(Meter_Type__c), ISCHANGED(Support_Level__c), ISCHANGED(SBQQ__DistributorDiscount__c) ) ), AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, 'Services'), OR( NOT(ISBLANK (TEXT(Support_Level__c))), NOT (ISBLANK(TEXT(Meter_Type__c))), SBQQ__DistributorDiscount__c>0 ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following fields should not be populated for Services Products : Meter Type , Support Level , One Time Discount.
